Label: Obligation
Title: Mandatory - used to generate citations; GeoBlacklight will use a default placeholder if no title is provided

Label: Purpose
Title: To provide the user with the name of the resource.

Label: Entry Guidelines
Title: Titles should include place names and dates when available.

Label: Commentary
Title: The title is the most prominent metadata field that users see when browsing or scanning search results. Since many datasets are created with ambiguous or non-unique titles, it may be worth the effort to improve or enhance them. The ideal sequence of a title is something akin to "Topic of Layer: Place, Year." Putting the year at the end of a title produces better search results, since titles are left-anchored.
